div1.head: Photograph of an aerial view of Quemados, Cuba with an overlay designating significant sites marked by [Philip Showalter Hench,] 1941
div1.p:
U.S. Army Air map of Quemados
taken about 1941 or at least before the newest bldg was built
at the Cuban Military Hosp
VERY IMPORTANT
PLEASE
Return
but please show
Dr. Nogueira
If Gen Trubys interpretation
of my old map is correct
this field → is precisely
where the old US cemetery
was
& where Dr. Lazear was
buried
Interesting to note that
on this map the field
seems uncultivated
Site of YF huts
The circle O is where the tree is
in this photo →
Note the #3 post-parts
outlined in red on photo is the
area occupied of the 8 little
“YF wards”
& where Lazear died
(old) LaPlaya road
La Playa RR tracks
Gen Lee St
Asunicion St →
St. Rosa St →
Footpaths
the one around →
the square fence
Little park →
Calzada Real →
↑ one of these is
Gen Lee's Hgts
